page.title: 01OUR AREA.
page.content: Our area consists of 12 sq kms,(4kms by 3kms).The land is mainly flat with some rolling hills.The soil is quite chalky thus making good land for growing crops.The biggest farm in our area is{Chalgrave Manor}farm.This has cattle and arable crops.Other farms in the area are Manor farm and Grove farm.The Sewage Works in Chalton deals with the sewage throughout our area. There are three main roads and a railway line. The roads are Luton Road, Dunstable Road and the {M1} motorway. The railway line goes through Chalton on its way to Leeds. Luton Road and Dunstable Road go through Chalton and the M1 motorway goes through Toddington.The main villages in our area are{Toddington,Chalton and {Fancott.}There are two schools { {Hillbough Lower}and{Brandreth Middle.
